reviews.review_msg: If you see Dave teaching a course stay away from him at all costs. $140 textbook is pointless, uses SPSS software again, pointless. According to him graduates use this program, thought 203 was undergrad?? Lecture slides are hard to follow and he has a very monotone voice. Assignments are ok and he posts past exams for practice that's helpful prep.
Horrible professor, avoid taking class with him if you want to succeed.
Horrible professor avoid this class with this professor if you want to succeed

Horrible. Either pick your sanity and mental health or take this class. Tests are extremely difficult, he never explains how to use the formulas he shares in class, and just assume you should know everything. Get ready to spend all your time doing notes in hopes to maybe pass.

He is very rude and disrespectful if you're not understanding course material. At first he seemed really nice. Either way, he never completes his notes and his tests are unreasonably. Horrible lectures, and horrible class I recommend taking it with a different professor.
Good Professor! You can concentrate on what the teacher said, do not worry about notes. He will give you enough time to write down the notes. The lecture is clear and easy to follow.
